name: Laharl
description:
He's the heir of the Overlord. 
The so called fiercest demon in the Netherworld.
But he's not good at dealing with busty women.

name: Killia
description: Supported by his friends, Killia has overcome his anger and sadness. No longer confused, his true power has already awakened.

name: Valvatorez
description:
This young vampire is a Prinny Instructor. 
His favorite thing in is sardines. 
It's said that he's actually a very influential being.

name: Adell
description:
He is a good young man who places great value on family.
He has his own "style" and yields to no one.
It is said that he is dating Rozalin.

name: Mao
description:
He's the current Dean of Evil Academy.
He has an EQ of 1.8 million and loves conducting evil research.
He's also a remodeling maniac who loves to drizzle soy sauce on omelets.

name: Etna
description:
She's Laharl's vassal and is known for her caustic tongue.
She is a great admirer of the late King Krichevskoy.
She runs through Prinnies as if they were paper napkins.

name: Fallen Angel Flonne
description:
A former Apprentice Angel who fell from heaven for the crime of injuring another Angel.
A love freak and Tokusatsu aficionado.
Devoted to spreading the word of love, with somewhat mixed results...

name: Seraphina
class_name_5: Princess Overlord of the Gorgeous Netherworld
description:
The Princess Overlord of the Gorgeous Netherworld who has overcome her fear of poverty.
Thanks to her newfound strength, she has become a fearless character.
She has subtle romantic feelings for Killia.

name: Fuka
description:
A middle school girl half transformed into a Prinny.
She is unconvinced of her own death and thinks she's dreaming.
She likes to rampage around with Desco.

name: Rozalin
description:
A naive and domineering young lady.
Now, she's learning all about the outside world, 
while living in harmony with Adell.

name: Axel
description:
A family-oriented dark hero... and a dunce.
He's got quite a lot of die hard fans who love
his fanciful delusions and positive attitude when facing difficulties.

name: Fenrich
description:
A young werewolf who serves Valvatorez.
He has many schemes to improve his Master's position.
"All is for my Lord" is his catchphrase.

name: Majorita
description:
The Witch Who Controls Death, a former Demon General.
She looks like a child, 
but her power rivals that of an Overlord.

name: Emizel
description:
The only son of Hugo, the former President of the Netherworld.
In order to become the President, 
he's busy doing his job as Death.

name: Barbara
description:
A demon who was once an Overlord Candidate.
The type of person who takes pride in faithfully carrying out orders, 
but is not good at acting on their own will.

name: Laharl-Chan
description:
Isn't it a tragedy?! A female Laharl.
But the same autocratic egotist all the same.
Her popularity has been soaring since the transformation.

name: Christo
description:
This so called Overlord has abandoned his prejudice against demons.
He's now being trusted as a rebel advisor.
He thinks he's managed to keep the fact that he's an angel a secret.

name: Zeroken
description:
An Overlord who has overcome his cowardice and timidness.
An easily elated Ultimate Demon Technique user.
He admires Killia as his senior disciple.

name: Red Magnus
description:
The Overlord of Scorching Flame, where ruffians gather. 
He loves to say "Super", and has a super boorish personality. 
However, he also has a gentle side and cares for his subordinates.

name: Krichevskoy
description:
Laharl's father, the Overlord who once ruled another Netherworld.
He has regained the power he had in his prime.

name: Sicily
description:
This girl is an angel from Celestia.
She is strong-minded and hardworking, and good at cooking.
It's said she likes Prinnies a lot.

name: Almaz
description:
The Hero Wannabe has grown into a true Hero.
Despite his cowardice, 
he's still practicing the "Hero's Oath". The Newly Married Hero!

name: Master Big Star
description:
A glittering, brilliant, big star.
The "Master" is not a term of endearment, it's part of his real name.

name: Salvatore
description:
Senior Honor Student at the Evil Academy, one of the legendary Diez Gentlemen.
No one has been able to carry out her unreasonable orders.
Her "femininity" is currently missing.

name: Sapphire
description:
The princess of a human kingdom.
She's still the "Killing Machine" 
despite being married to Almaz. Her goal is to become "the strongest creature on earth."

name: Nemo
description:
A soul born from hatred toward humans.
Controlled by Fear the Great. It creates malice, 
and uses this malice to gain more power.

name: Bloodis
description:
Former Demon General once known as the Great Demon Fist. 
His fists, which he uses with overwhelming power, 
can crush anything that stands in his way.

name: Nagi
description:
She is a 14-year-old girl who utilizes mechanical techniques left behind by her father.
She has a strong will to end all war.

name: Rutile
class_name_4: Transfer Student from the Human World
description:
A kind girl who's a human-Nekomata hybrid.
She possesses super strength despite her slender appearance.

name: Stella
class_name_3: The ONLY Daughter of the Dean
class_name_4: Class Representative of the Majin Academy
class_name_5: Slaughter Union President of the Majin Academy
description:
The daughter of a Majin who likes pulling pranks.
She has really unique taste and fancies slimes and zombies.

name: Xenolith
description:
A taciturn young demon. 
He has extraordinary magical power 
and such a cold attitude that no one dares to approach him.

name: Apprentice Angel Flonne
description:
An Apprentice Angel who respects Seraph Lamington.
She becomes a companion of Laharl for her missionary work: spreading the ideals of universal love.

name: Pure Flonne
description:
Flonne's awakened Archangel form, overflowing with the power of belief. The force of great love 
has improved her abilities!

name: Archangel Flonne
class_name_5: The Best Archangel of All Time
description:
An amazing Archangel who unites the angels in Celestia.
A love freak and Tokusatsu aficionado.

name: Void Dark
description:
The strongest Overlord who sent the entire Netherworld into a maelstrom of war. 
The Demon Generals and the forces of the Lost are at his command.
He has a checkered past with Killia.

name: Artina
description:
An Angel tasked by Celestia to collect money from the Netherworld.
Doing her job too well has resulted in 
Demons calling her the "Angel of Avarice".

name: Sister Artina
description:
Artina when she was still alive as a human.
Pure and innocent, 
she's saved the lives of countless soldiers.

name: Tyrant Valvatorez
description:
A powerful vampire with the name of "Tyrant". 
He thinks the mission of demons is to strike fear into human hearts, and he takes pride in it.
His goal is to become the avatar of terror.

name: Tyrant Overlord Killidia
description:
Killia's visage when he was possessed by destructive impulses. 
Known as the Tyrant Overlord, he gives out 
a terrifying evil aura that keeps others away.

name: Etna (2P)
description:
It's still not bad 
even with the difference in stats. 
Without this [Basic] understanding, 
it wouldn't be Etna (2P).

name: Majin Etna
description:
Majin from another Netherworld. Her power rivals that of an Overlord. 
Her vicious roasts can burn people to a crisp.

name: Asagi
description:
Even an Overlord would recognize her manner and fighting skills. 
She is a mysterious girl of unknown origin.
She has wandered across many Netherworlds.

name: Gordon
description:
The 37th Defender of Earth. 
Defeated by Laharl and made his vassal.

name: Jennifer
description:
A genius who earned her doctorate at the age of 10. 
She made Thursday the robot at the age of 5.

name: Mr. Champloo
description:
He's a master of High-Firepower Chaotic Kitchen Fist.
And this mysterious Chef uses culinary metaphors for everything.

name: Yukimaru
description:
Kunoichi of Snow Melody Village who's known 
for adding "Zam" at the end of every sentence. The only flaw in her character is that 
she feels responsible for every incident and is always trying to commit suicide.

name: Fubuki
description:
Yukimaru's big brother. 
Devoted to the reconstruction 
of Snow Melody Village. He's got a nice voice.

name: Awakened Rozalin
class_name_2: A Past That Must Be Forgotten
description:
Rozalin, with the God of All Overlords' power awakened within her. 
She's surrounded by an ominous aura 
that overwhelms her enemies.

name: Justice Flonne
description:
Flonne with her Justice Power awakened.
The Hammer of Justice takes aim at the wicked Netherworld!

name: Pleinair
description:
The mascot of Haradaya, 
the official website of Harada the character designer.
Been working as the receptionist of the Dark Assembly for years.

name: Dark Santa Laharl
description:
Changing into a Christmas costume 
does not change Laharl's personality. 
Presents are not to be given away, they are to be taken away!

name: Noelle
description:
She is a Mage girl who longs to be Santa Claus. 
She's all dressed up and ready to go. 
Let's go distribute presents!

name: Attired Rozalin
class_name_5: Black Rose of the New Year
description:
Rozalin, dressed in the traditional attire 
of Snow Melody Village. She's very excited about having a Hatsumoude date 
with Adell.

name: Pure Sicily
description:
Sicily as the Magic Cutie of Love and Justice. 
She claims to feel embarrassed, but gets used to 
the fluttery and frilly costume really fast.

name: Dark Artina
description:
Artina as a Magic Cutie. 
Mysterious yet sexy, 
not bad at all.

name: Love Oracle
description:
A Magic Cutie who claims to have been born in a dandelion.
Boy, girl, who really cares? 
What matters is we all love Magic Cuties!

name: Bunny Seraphina
class_name_5: Princess Overlord of the Gorgeous Netherworld
description:
Seraphina, the Princess Overlord of the Gorgeous Netherworld, 
has come for Easter in a bunny suit. 
It looks like she's looking for a capable servant!

name: Easter Mao
description:
Mao in his Easter costume. 
The Easter Eggs he made with his 1.8 Million Evil Quotient... 
What is he going to do with them?

name: Gym Shorts Fuka
description:
Fuka in short shorts is going to take part in the Fest-evil of Sport. 
She has no doubt she'll win because it's "in her dream". 
Nevertheless, she's still gonna put in the effort.

name: Ayame
description:
The knight of steel who's been appointed the cheerleader of the Fest-evil of Sport. 
She likes to wear boys' uniform, 
and can't even sleep without it on.

name: Virunga
description:
The Archangel who protects the order of Celestia 
with her own justice. 
Capable as she is, her values are a bit biased.

name: Prism Red
description:
Prism Red of the Prism Rangers. 
The hot-blooded one with a strong sense of justice.

name: Prism Blue
description:
Prism Blue of the Prism Rangers.
He's the cool one and was once Red's Rival.

name: Prism Yellow
description:
Prism Yellow of the Prism Rangers.
A foodie who loves curry.

name: Prism Green
description:
Prism Green of the Prism Rangers.
A timid nerd who loves science.

name: Prism Purple
description:
Prism Purple of the Prism Rangers.
A man with a girl's heart. Actually he's the oldest one among the rangers.

name: Prism Orange
description:
Prism Orange of the Prism Rangers.
An exotic traveler. He loves fun stuff.

name: Prism Indigo
description:
Prism Indigo of the Prism Rangers.
Just a commoner. He is bothered by his very existence.

name: Prism Pink
description:
Prism Pink of the Prism Rangers.
Just a commoner. He is bothered by his very existence.

name: Prism White
description:
Prism White of the Prism Rangers.
Just a commoner. He is bothered by his very existence.

name: Prism Black
description:
Prism Black of the Prism Rangers.
Just a commoner. He is bothered by his very existence.

name: Kyoko Needleworker
description:
An earnest ninja girl who attends Evil Academy. 
She's strong-minded and loves knitting.

name: Asuka Cranekick
description:
A polite samurai girl who attends Evil Academy. 
She's quiet and enjoys folding paper cranes.

name: Lanzarote
description:
A popular Netherworld idol who sings and dances. 
She aims for the throne of the Overlord in secret.
Stars fly about when she speaks.

name: Beheritas
description:
One of the Ten Asura Kings of a the powerful Roaring Rampant Netherworld.
Survived a brutal battle royale with his brothers to become a Demon General.
Now acts as a loyal servant to Void Dark.

name: Panchos
description:
Former underlings of Red Magnus, Overlord of Scorching Flame. 
He joined the Lost as he had had enough of the Overlord's selfishness.
He holds a grudge for being bossed around and treated like a slave.

name: Logan
description:
The Blood Parch Overlord, who's feared as the "Throwing Devil Overlord".
He is now too old to keep up his strength.
He hates the Lost for taking everything from him.

name: Warrior
description:
A warrior with a strong body and an indomitable spirit.
A professional at close quarters combat.

name: Lady Fighter
description:
A female warrior with both flexibility and strength.
Excels at one-point blitzkrieg combat.

name: Martial Artist
description:
A martial artist who has mastered the physical arts.
His unique attire is a traditional costume that 
is testament to the legacy of his ancestors.

name: Fight Mistress
description:
A female martial artist with fancy skills. 
She hails from the small frontier world, 
the "Village of Beasts".

name: Red Skull
description:
An earnest magician boy.
Highly intelligent despite his physical weakness.

name: Blue Skull
description:
An earnest magician boy.
Highly intelligent despite his physical weakness.

name: Green Skull
description:
An earnest magician boy.
Highly intelligent despite his physical weakness.

name: Star Skull
description:
An earnest magician boy.
Highly intelligent despite his physical weakness.

name: Red Mage
description:
An innocent magician girl.
As a female demon, she was born with 
a natural talent for magic.

name: Blue Mage
description:
An innocent magician girl.
As a female demon, she was born with 
a natural talent for magic.

name: Green Mage
description:
An innocent magician girl.
As a female demon, she was born with 
a natural talent for magic.

name: Star Mage
description:
An innocent magician girl.
As a female demon, she was born with 
a natural talent for magic.

name: Clergy
description:
A priest that punishes himself while healing others.
He is a sensible person 
who has no prejudice against humans or angels.

name: Cleric
description:
A priestess who heals her wounded companions.
She follows the scriptures of Vinaya 
and is always meditating.

name: Archeress
description:
A kind-hearted hunter of the Netherworld.
She has a kind of precognition to accurately 
predict the wind speed and direction.

name: Thief
description:
A thief who risks her life to collect treasures. 
Second to none when it comes to stealing.

name: Maid
description:
A faithful maid to her master. 
The accuracy of her work is not good enough, 
but she looks cute when she is focused on her work.

name: Gunner
description:
A gunman who dispatches his enemies with quick movement. 
He has the trust of his friends, but he does 
not talk much and prefers to be alone.

name: Ninja
description:
A cold-hearted assassin who lives in the shadows. 
He specializes in his unique fighting technique, "Ninja Art".

name: Lady Samurai
description:
A sword maiden who exorcises demons. 
Her clan guards the sanctuary around the Gate of Celestia, 
the door that connects the Netherworld and Celestia.

name: Armor Knight
description:
A knight of steel who boasts an ironclad defense. 
Admired by children for wielding his sword 
and protecting his master.

name: Magic Knight
description:
Skilled in both sword and magic, such talent 
is rare even among demons.

name: Professor
description:
A researcher of magic science.
It's said that great cares are taken on experiment subjects.

name: Sage
description:
A child of wisdom raised by a Nether Tree who's lived for 100 million years. 
She can hear the voice of plants and trees and has a close relationship with fairies.

name: Wrestler
description:
A warrior who spends his days fighting the strong. 
He excels at fighting in pairs.

name: Pirate
description:
A pirate who runs through the vast universe. 
He excels at long-range sniping.

name: Dark Knight
description:
A knight in black who controls the darkness. 
The jet-black flames flickering in the depths of his eyes 
would bring the fear of death to anyone who sees the flames.

name: Kunoichi
description:
The beautiful Kunoichi dances in the darkness. 
She plays the enemy with her phantom-like movements.

name: Sorcerer
description:
A spell caster who spreads misery around. 
She has her own definition of good and evil and believes that 
her mission is to control the misery of others.

name: Onmyo Monk
description:
A spell caster who controls the fields with his unique ability. 
His power is deemed moderate, 
but many appreciate the potential that his abilities hold.

name: Beastmaster
description:
A wild warrior who lives with Monsters. 
She is passionate about breeding the best Monsters, 
and no one outperforms her in terms of 
knowledge and skills.

name: Masked Hero
description:
An unidentified wannabe hero. 
His ability to escape is unrivalled.

name: Android
description:
Weaponry designed in a female form.
The armor is made of a special metal, 
making it highly durable and flexible.

name: Bouncer
description:
A guardian dressed in a black suit. 
He has a strong spirit and will use his own body 
to shield his master.

name: Battle Suit
description:
A powerful battle suit made by humans.
It increases the stats of its user a lot.

name: Gustak Soldier
description:
Soldiers who come from an empire in the cold regions of the Human World. 
He can't put on his armor by himself.

name: Lekidona Soldier
description:
Soldier who comes from an empire in the desert regions of the Human World. 
He has strong legs and feet thanks to his training in the sand.

name: Celestial Host
description:
Heavenly soldier specializing in battle. 
He upholds the heavenly law and 
ruthlessly eliminates those who oppose it.

name: Celestial Hostess
description:
A female soldier who protects the celestial peace. 
Because of her firm beliefs, 
she is a bit stubborn in certain ways.

name: Dead Pirate
description:
This dead demon is controlled by others. 
It has no thoughts and just fights as commanded.

name: Dead Knight
description:
This dead demon is controlled by others. 
It has no thoughts and just fights as commanded.

name: Dead Sage
description:
This dead demon is controlled by others. 
It has no thoughts and just fights as commanded.

name: EDF Soldier
description:
It is the second most coveted occupation for boys, after the Defender of Earth. 
Not only is he skilled with axes and guns, 
he is also an excellent fighter with fists.

name: EDF Soldier
description:
It is the second most coveted occupation for boys, after the Defender of Earth. 
Not only is he skilled with axes and guns, 
he is also an excellent fighter with fists.

name: EDF Soldier
description:
It is the second most coveted occupation for boys, after the Defender of Earth. 
Not only is he skilled with axes and guns, 
he is also an excellent fighter with fists.

name: EDF Soldier
description:
It is the second most coveted occupation for boys, after the Defender of Earth. 
Not only is he skilled with axes and guns, 
he is also an excellent fighter with fists.

name: Usalia
description:
Toto Bunny Overlord, affected by the curse of berserk. 
She suppresses the curse by eating curry. 
She's a well-behaved girl with a strong will.

name: Raspberyl
description:
She's a graduate of Evil Academy and now a Delinquent Teacher. 
She's a super Delinquent who works every day raising money, donating blood, and engaging in volunteer work. 
A life rebelling against demon conventions sure looks cool.

name: Desco
description:
A girl created to destroy the world. 
Her dream is to become the strongest Final Boss in the world. 
She admires Fuka as her Big Sis.

name: Des X
description: The Final Boss and the ultimate weapon created by Genjuro Kazamatsuri, DESCO, Perfect Version. The true culprit who hated and killed Fuka.

name: Prinny Kurtis
description:
This green Prinny is working as a Defender of Earth. 
He tries hard to add "dood" to the end of every sentence.

name: Pringer V3
description: The deadliest robot ever found in the Prinny world. Only disciplined Prinnies can become robots.... It looks just like a Prinny, but it doesn't explode when thrown.

name: Hugo
description:
The Netherworld President, who reigns over all demons.
He's Emizel's Father.
Is he the cause of all this corruption...?

name: Thursday
description:
An all-purpose robot made by Jennifer. 
It is equipped with a computerized voice and a self-destruct mechanism.

name: Taro
description:
A timid and cynical person, Adell's younger brother. 
He has horns on his head due to the curse of Overlord Zenon. 
He admires and respects Rozalin.

name: Hanako
description:
The younger sister of Adell and Taro, who's shy but energetic. 
She has wings on her back due to the curse of Overlord Zenon. 
Despite her young age, her cooking skills are on par with the professionals.

name: Tink
description:
Rozalin's childhood friend and subordinate of Overlord Zenon. 
He used to be a handsome boy, 
but somehow was turned into a frog.

name: Red Tink
description:
Rozalin's childhood friend and subordinate of Overlord Zenon. 
Normally a gentle demon, but when enraged, 
he becomes violent and dangerous.

name: Vulcanus
description:
This archangel is jealous of Flonne, who's favored by the Seraph. 
He lost himself in ambition and anger and has gone haywire.

name: Kurtis
description:
He was caught up in an incident and lost 70% of his body. 
He's a cyborg who calls himself the Defender of Earth.

name: Lamington
description:
Lamington is the High Seraph of Celestia.
He sent Flonne to the Netherworld to carry out a secret plan.

name: Don Joaquin
class_name_5: The Glorious First Defender of Earth
description:
The First Hero of the Netherworld. 
Unable to fulfill his mission, his regrets have driven his soul to wander the Netherworld.

name: Mid-Boss
description:
A mysterious demon who's often called 
Mid-Boss by Laharl and his friends. He calls himself Vyers the Dark Adonis, 
but that name is not generally accepted by others.

name: Ms. Raspberyl
description:
She's a graduate of Evil Academy and now a Delinquent Teacher. 
She's a super Delinquent who works every day raising money, donating blood, and engaging in volunteer work. 
A life rebelling against demon conventions sure looks cool.

name: Santa Usalia
class_name_1: Rabbit Overlord of the Holy Night
class_name_2: Rabbit Overlord of the Holy Night
description:
It's nice to get dressed, but Usalia 
doesn't know what Christmas is all about. 
So she decides to go distribute curry.

name: Mirror Cake Prinny
description:
Prinnies that look happy.
But their actual condition 
is too dark to divulge...

name: Gym Shorts Raspberyl
description:
Raspberyl in short shorts 
is going to take part in the Fest-evil of Sport. She never misses a prep session before sports 
and always makes sure the members of Team Evil are prepared as well.

name: Grosso
description:
A demon who was a vassal of the late King Krichevskoy. 
He was known as a chief strategist and commanded battles. 
... or so it's said. Now no one remembers the details.

name: Rainier
description:
A demon who was a vassal of the late King Krichevskoy. 
She was favored for her ability as a treasure hunter. 
It's said that she took good care of Laharl.

name: Porkmeister
description:
Son of a rich demon. Unlike his father, he has a solid character. 
It's said that he looked cuter in the past. 
He respects Overlord Laharl.

name: Hoggmeiser
description:
A rich demon who loves money and his son. 
He produces idols and makes a killing. 
Put "$" at the end of every sentence and you can imitate him!

name: Izuna
description:
The warrior chief of the exclusive Dragon Fang Netherworld. 
Daughter of Drumdawn, the Legendary Dragon Overlord 
She has a strong male demeanor and is well-liked by her peers.

name: Brave
description:
The proud Overlord of Fortress de Gaulle. 
He's willing to risk his life to rebel against 
Void Dark the Demon Emperor.

name: Drumdawn
description:
The Legendary Dragon Overlord of Dragon Fang Netherworld
He once defeated all the Heroes of the Human World. 
He pretends not to care, but in fact, his daughter Izuna is the most important thing in his life.

name: Geese
class_name_4: Still an Overlord Even If Rotten, Literally
description:
Spirit Interment Overlord who was killed by 
Majorita the Demon General and lost his memories. 
He also lost his power as an Overlord.

name: Erynder Z
description:
Overlord of Demunshroom Netherworld with a high reproductive ability. 
He's very belligerent and has a strong sense of territory. 
He feels inferior because of his childlike appearance.

name: Garungun
description:
A demon who was a vassal of the late King Krichevskoy. 
It's said that a Majin is sealed in his left arm. Chniby.
He is the Black Winged Destroyer of legend.

name: Hedler
description:
The Overlord of Poisondise, who can use all kinds of poisons. 
He has learned to use deadly poisons to compensate for his weaknesses. 
He has a tendency to get carried away when he is flattered.

name: Maderas
description:
A high demon in service of King Krichevskoy. 
He was banished for stealing 
the King's favorite food, black pretzels.

name: Yellow Prinny
description: Enemy Data

name: Usalia's Father
description: Usalia's Father

name: Usalia's Mother
description: Usalia's Mother

name: Corpse Rabbit
description:
A combat unit formed in response to invasions. 
The citizens respect them and call them "Troopers".

name: Prinny
description:
A downtrodden staple of the Netherworld. 
It's fated to be thrown and explode!

name: Prinny
description:
A downtrodden staple of the Netherworld. 
It's fated to be thrown and explode!

name: Prinny
description:
A downtrodden staple of the Netherworld. 
It's fated to be thrown and explode!

name: Prinny
description:
A downtrodden staple of the Netherworld. 
It's fated to be thrown and explode!

name: Imp
description:
A mischievous little demon who likes to play tricks. 
It looks down on those weaker than itself.

name: Imp
description:
A mischievous little demon who likes to play tricks. 
It looks down on those weaker than itself.

name: Imp
description:
A mischievous little demon who likes to play tricks. 
It looks down on those weaker than itself.

name: Imp
description:
A mischievous little demon who likes to play tricks. 
It looks down on those weaker than itself.

name: Orc
description:
A small creature with a bad temper. 
Brave enough to stand up to opponents 
larger than itself without running away.

name: Orc
description:
A small creature with a bad temper. 
Brave enough to stand up to opponents 
larger than itself without running away.

name: Orc
description:
A small creature with a bad temper. 
Brave enough to stand up to opponents 
larger than itself without running away.

name: Orc
description:
A small creature with a bad temper. 
Brave enough to stand up to opponents 
larger than itself without running away.

name: Rabbit
description:
A combat unit formed in response to invasions. 
The citizens respect them and call them "Troopers".

name: Rabbit
description:
A combat unit formed in response to invasions. 
The citizens respect them and call them "Troopers".

name: Rabbit
description:
A combat unit formed in response to invasions. 
The citizens respect them and call them "Troopers".

name: Rabbit
description:
A combat unit formed in response to invasions. 
The citizens respect them and call them "Troopers".

name: Fairy
description:
A light fairy with a large lantern. 
She is concerned about her careless father 
who transformed into mana and got stuck in her lantern.

name: Fairy
description:
A light fairy with a large lantern. 
She is concerned about her careless father 
who transformed into mana and got stuck in her lantern.

name: Fairy
description:
A light fairy with a large lantern. 
She is concerned about her careless father
